event.title: was created from part of the town of Homer in 1798

data.event: The town was created from part of the town of Homer in 1798, before the formation of Cortland County.

event.title: lost territory to the towns of Truxton (1811

data.event: Solon lost territory to the towns of Truxton (1811) and Taylor (1849).
The population of the town reached a peak of 2,311 in 1840.
By 1865, the population had dropped to 995.

event.title: was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1978

data.event: The Hatheway Homestead was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1978.
